title: Unable to see club in new client.
body:
Howdy,

I have not been able to see my club details since updating to the new client. My partner is in the same club and can confirm his client shows me as an online member when I log in, but when I go to profile>club it just displays options to start a club, and offers information on clubs, but no indication on my current club!

Any assistance or info would be greatly appreciated!

~Myrt

replies.body:
Apologies for the delayed response... ._.

The club is ^0_x^

Thanks for any assistance!

~Myrt

Well that sounds super annoying, but not to worry, I can check out the club and see if I can get it to work on the new client too. ;D
Might be that something just isn't syncing properly on our end if others can see you. Can you give me the club name and/or the tag for it so I can find it?
